cocktails.name: Martini
cocktails.description: A classic martini is the epitome of sophistication, served in a chilled, stemmed glass. It is crystal clear with a smooth, crisp taste that combines the botanical notes of gin with the dry, herbal hints of vermouth. Garnished with a lemon twist or olive, its aroma is a delicate mix of citrus and brine. Each sip is light and silky, offering a clean, refreshing finish that embodies elegance and tradition.
instructions: Start by chilling a martini glass in the freezer for about 10-15 minutes or fill it with ice water while you prepare the drink.
Fill a mixing glass with ice. Add the gin and dry vermouth.
Stir the mixture for about 30 seconds or shake it in a cocktail shaker if you prefer a slightly more diluted and colder drink.
Strain the mixture into the chilled martini glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist or an olive, based on your preference.

cocktails.name: Old Fashioned
cocktails.description: A classic Old Fashioned is a timeless cocktail, rich and balanced. It features bourbon or rye whiskey, sugar, and bitters, garnished with an orange twist and a cherry. The flavors are robust and complex, offering a smooth, slightly sweet finish.
instructions: Muddle the sugar cube and bitters with water in a glass.
Add the whiskey and stir to combine.
Fill the glass with large ice cubes.
Garnish with an orange twist and a cherry.

cocktails.name: Margarita
cocktails.description: A refreshing and zesty Margarita, perfect for any occasion. This cocktail combines tequila, lime juice, and orange liqueur, served in a salt-rimmed glass. The result is a tangy, balanced drink with a hint of sweetness.
instructions: Rub the rim of a margarita glass with a lime wedge and dip it in salt to coat.
Fill a shaker with ice and add the tequila, lime juice, and orange liqueur.
Shake well and strain into the prepared glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a lime wheel.

cocktails.name: Mojito
cocktails.description: A Mojito is a refreshing Cuban cocktail, known for its minty freshness. It combines white rum, fresh lime juice, sugar, mint leaves, and soda water, resulting in a crisp and invigorating drink.
instructions: Muddle the mint leaves and sugar in a glass.
Add lime juice and rum, then fill the glass with ice.
Top with soda water and stir gently.
Garnish with a sprig of mint and a lime wheel.

cocktails.name: Cosmopolitan
cocktails.description: A Cosmopolitan is a chic and vibrant cocktail, popularized in the 1990s. It blends vodka, cranberry juice, triple sec, and lime juice, resulting in a tangy and sweet drink, often served in a martini glass.
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice and add the vodka, cranberry juice, triple sec, and lime juice.
Shake well and strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with a lime twist.

cocktails.name: Manhattan
cocktails.description: The Manhattan is a classic cocktail, featuring a robust blend of rye whiskey, sweet vermouth, and bitters. Served in a chilled glass and garnished with a cherry, it offers a rich, slightly sweet flavor profile.
instructions: Fill a mixing glass with ice and add the whiskey, vermouth, and bitters.
Stir well and strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with a cherry.

cocktails.name: Daiquiri
cocktails.description: The Daiquiri is a classic cocktail known for its simplicity and refreshing taste. It combines white rum, lime juice, and simple syrup, creating a light, tangy drink served in a chilled glass.
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice and add the rum, lime juice, and simple syrup.
Shake well and strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with a lime wheel.

cocktails.name: Whiskey Sour
cocktails.description: A Whiskey Sour is a timeless cocktail, balancing the boldness of whiskey with the tartness of lemon juice and the sweetness of simple syrup. Served over ice and garnished with a cherry and orange slice, it offers a perfect harmony of flavors.
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice and add the bourbon, lemon juice, and simple syrup.
Shake well and strain into a glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

cocktails.name: Pina Colada
cocktails.description: The Pina Colada is a tropical delight, blending rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice. Served blended or shaken, this creamy, sweet cocktail is garnished with a pineapple wedge and cherry.
instructions: Blend or shake the rum, coconut cream, pineapple juice, and ice until smooth.
Pour into a hurricane glass.
Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.

cocktails.name: Negroni
cocktails.description: A Negroni is a bold and bittersweet cocktail, featuring gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth. Served over ice and garnished with an orange twist, it offers a complex and balanced flavor profile.
instructions: Fill a mixing glass with ice and add the gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth.
Stir well and strain into an old fashioned glass filled with ice.
Garnish with an orange twist.

cocktails.name: Tom Collins
cocktails.description: The Tom Collins is a refreshing, fizzy cocktail, combining gin, lemon juice, simple syrup, and soda water. Served over ice and garnished with a lemon slice and cherry, it is a light and invigorating drink.
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice and add the gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup.
Shake well and strain into a collins glass filled with ice.
Top with soda water and stir gently.
Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry.

cocktails.name: Mint Julep
cocktails.description: The Mint Julep is a refreshing southern classic, featuring bourbon, fresh mint, sugar, and water. Served over crushed ice and garnished with a mint sprig, it offers a cool and invigorating experience.
instructions: Muddle the mint leaves and sugar with water in a julep cup.
Fill the cup with crushed ice and add bourbon.
Stir well and garnish with a mint sprig.

cocktails.name: Mai Tai
cocktails.description: The Mai Tai is a vibrant and exotic cocktail, blending rum, lime juice, orgeat syrup, and orange liqueur. Served over ice and garnished with mint and lime, it delivers a balanced and tropical flavor.
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice and add the light rum, dark rum, lime juice, orgeat syrup, and orange liqueur.
Shake well and strain into a glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a mint sprig and a lime wheel.

cocktails.name: Gimlet
cocktails.description: The Gimlet is a classic and simple cocktail, featuring gin and lime juice, balanced with a touch of simple syrup. Served in a chilled glass, it is a crisp and refreshing drink with a tart finish.
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice and add the gin, lime juice, and simple syrup.
Shake well and strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with a lime twist.

cocktails.name: Bloody Mary
cocktails.description: The Bloody Mary is a savory cocktail, perfect for brunch. It combines vodka, tomato juice, and various spices and flavorings, served over ice and garnished with celery, olives, and a lemon wedge.
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice and add the vodka, tomato juice, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, hot sauce, celery salt, and black pepper.
Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a celery stick, olives, and a lemon wedge.

cocktails.name: French 75
cocktails.description: The French 75 is a sophisticated cocktail, combining gin, lemon juice, simple syrup, and champagne. Served in a champagne flute and garnished with a lemon twist, it offers a bubbly and refreshing experience.
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice and add the gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup.
Shake well and strain into a champagne flute.
Top with champagne and garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Sazerac
cocktails.description: The Sazerac is a potent and flavorful cocktail, featuring rye whiskey, absinthe, and bitters. Served in a chilled glass and garnished with a lemon twist, it offers a bold and aromatic experience.
instructions: Rinse a chilled glass with absinthe and discard the excess.
Muddle the sugar cube and bitters in a mixing glass.
Add the rye whiskey and ice, then stir well.
Strain into the prepared glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Sidecar
cocktails.description: The Sidecar is a classic cocktail, featuring cognac, triple sec, and lemon juice. Served in a sugar-rimmed glass, it offers a perfect balance of sweetness and tartness.
instructions: Rub the rim of a martini glass with a lemon wedge and dip it in sugar to coat.
Fill a shaker with ice and add the cognac, triple sec, and lemon juice.
Shake well and strain into the prepared glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Paloma
cocktails.description: The Paloma is a refreshing Mexican cocktail, featuring tequila, grapefruit soda, and lime juice. Served over ice and garnished with a lime wedge, it is a light and invigorating drink.
instructions: Rub the rim of a highball glass with a lime wedge and dip it in salt to coat.
Fill the glass with ice and add the tequila and lime juice.
Top with grapefruit soda and stir gently.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Caipirinha
cocktails.description: The Caipirinha is a traditional Brazilian cocktail, featuring cachaça, lime, and sugar. Served over ice, it offers a refreshing and tangy taste, perfect for hot days.
instructions: Cut the lime into wedges and muddle with the sugar in a glass.
Fill the glass with ice and add the cachaça.
Stir well and garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Moscow Mule
cocktails.description: The Moscow Mule is a spicy and refreshing cocktail, combining vodka, ginger beer, and lime juice. Served in a copper mug and garnished with a lime wedge, it offers a crisp and invigorating taste.
instructions: Fill a copper mug with ice and add the vodka and lime juice.
Top with ginger beer and stir gently.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Pisco Sour
cocktails.description: The Pisco Sour is a South American classic, featuring pisco, lime juice, simple syrup, and egg white. Shaken to a frothy consistency and garnished with bitters, it offers a balanced and tangy flavor.
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice and add the pisco, lime juice, simple syrup, and egg white.
Shake vigorously and strain into a glass.
Garnish with a dash of bitters.

cocktails.name: Vesper
cocktails.description: The Vesper is a sophisticated cocktail made famous by James Bond, combining gin, vodka, and Lillet Blanc. Served in a chilled glass and garnished with a lemon twist, it offers a smooth and strong flavor.
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice and add the gin, vodka, and Lillet Blanc.
Shake well and strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Amaretto Sour
cocktails.description: The Amaretto Sour is a sweet and tangy cocktail, featuring amaretto liqueur and lemon juice. Served over ice and garnished with a cherry, it offers a smooth and balanced flavor profile.
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice and add the amaretto, lemon juice, simple syrup, and egg white.
Shake well and strain into a glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a cherry.

cocktails.name: Dark 'n' Stormy
cocktails.description: The Dark 'n' Stormy is a bold and spicy cocktail, combining dark rum and ginger beer. Served over ice and garnished with a lime wedge, it offers a refreshing and robust taste.
instructions: Fill a glass with ice and add the ginger beer.
Float the dark rum on top.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Margarita
cocktails.description: The Margarita is a popular Mexican cocktail, featuring tequila, lime juice, and triple sec. Served over ice in a salt-rimmed glass and garnished with a lime wedge, it offers a balanced and tangy flavor.
instructions: Rub the rim of a margarita glass with a lime wedge and dip it in salt to coat.
Fill a shaker with ice and add the tequila, lime juice, and triple sec.
Shake well and strain into the prepared glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Martini
cocktails.description: The Martini is a timeless classic, featuring gin and dry vermouth. Served in a chilled glass and garnished with an olive or a lemon twist, it offers a clean and sophisticated taste.
instructions: Fill a mixing glass with ice and add the gin and dry vermouth.
Stir well and strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with an olive or a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Espresso Martini
cocktails.description: The Espresso Martini is a sophisticated and energizing cocktail, featuring vodka, coffee liqueur, and freshly brewed espresso. Served in a chilled glass and garnished with coffee beans, it offers a rich and robust flavor.
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice and add the vodka, coffee liqueur, espresso, and simple syrup.
Shake well and strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with coffee beans.

cocktails.name: Mojito
cocktails.description: The Mojito is a refreshing Cuban cocktail, combining white rum, lime juice, mint leaves, sugar, and soda water. Served over ice and garnished with a mint sprig and lime wedge, it offers a light and invigorating flavor.
instructions: Muddle the mint leaves and sugar with lime juice in a glass.
Fill the glass with ice and add the rum.
Top with soda water and stir gently.
Garnish with a mint sprig and a lime wedge.
